lines: Wakali kuli Jesu kusanzyigwa? Wasamba mu bulowa bwakwe
Hena ula syoma mu nguzu zyakwe, Wa samba mu bulowa bwakwe.
Wasamba bulowa, Mbwa katila mwana mbelele?
Hena Minjila yako yatuba bu wasamba mu bulowa bwakwe.
Hena ula enda a Mufutuli? Hena wasamba mu bulowa?
Hena wasamba mu cingano cakwe? Wasamba mu bulowa bwakwe.
Na bwinga abola kulaba buti? Muya kuli bambila sena?
Mula lyokezya sena mu ciingano? Wasamba mu bulowa bwakwe.
Kosowa zikobela zila tombe Usambe mubulowa bwakwe
Mpolili itinti ku babi abo Basamba mu bulowa bwakwe.
